item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 13, 01:00 - 02:00 UTC

Apr 3, 22:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/04/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 13/04/2023 02:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on customers' projects. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, nor performance issue are expected.

item.title: [Global][Collaborative solutions] - Mailjet email pertubation
item.description:
Apr 6, 18:02 UTC
Identified - Update : Our technical teams always work with the partner to resolve the incident.
Workaround : Client can use the classic mail() php function instead of Mailjet. This enable to send mail again.

Update will be made as significant progress is made.

Apr 6, 13:02 UTC
Update - Workaround : Client can use the classic mail() php function instead of Mailjet. This enable to send mail again.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue.
Update will be made as significant progress is made.

Apr 6, 12:21 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/04/2023 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Email send through a Mailjet server might be blocked.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be made as significant progress is made.

item.title: [Global][VoIP] - Telephony Bill generation
item.description:
Apr 5, 12:34 UTC
Monitoring - Update : Our teams have solved the issue. We put the status of the ticket in "monitoring" until the backlog is processed.

The billing this month will be delayed by 2 days due to this incident.

Apr 3, 10:11 UTC
Identified - Start time : 01/04/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : We are facing delay in the telephony bill generation. CDR is not available.
The bill generation will be fully accomplished the 06/04/2023
Root cause : Software issue
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
